issue.title: [CF 405] Let unit CD icons check all units
issue.body:
Do it. Could be a nightmare of efficiency, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #405 | Raw

comments.body:
Also, some sort of filtering will probably be needed. Now I'm skeptical.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Still needs filtering

Edited Jan 7, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hurry up and put filtering in so I can release.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I don't like this anymore. If someone else does (whoever reads this), provide a convincing argument in favor and I may bring it back.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
